hotels.name: Homa
hotels.description: Tehran Homa Hotel, one of the most prestigious five-star hotels in the capital.

comments.text: Amazing hotel! The staff was incredibly helpful.
The view from the room was spectacular. I highly recommend staying here.
One of the best hotels I've stayed at in Tehran. Worth the price.

hotels.name: Espinas Palace
hotels.description: A luxurious five-star hotel offering panoramic views of Tehran.

comments.text: Absolutely stunning views from the top floors.
Great service and comfortable rooms. Highly recommended.
The food at the hotel restaurant was delicious. A five-star experience!

hotels.name: Parsian Azadi
hotels.description: A top-class hotel with exceptional service and amenities.

comments.text: Fantastic hotel with superb amenities. I felt like royalty.
The location is great, and the service was impeccable. I'll definitely return.

hotels.name: Ferdowsi International Grand Hotel
hotels.description: An elegant hotel in the heart of Tehran with easy access to tourist attractions.

comments.text: Good location, and the rooms are spacious and comfortable.
The hotel was nice, but the service could have been better.

hotels.name: Evin
hotels.description: Tehran Evin Hotel, one of the most prestigious five-star hotels in the capital.

comments.text: Amazing hotel!.
The view from the room was spectacular. I highly recommend staying here.
One of the best hotels I've stayed at in Tehran. Worth the price.
